doc.title: Irondale Barbershop
doc.plot: Certain places in America have for better or worse maintained an integrity despite our country's powerful homogenizing impulse. Like the music and personal biography of Hank Williams, which have both been appropriated and redeployed by the engines and engineers of American homogeneity, the Deep South is full of beauty, contradiction, consternation, and mythology. Inspired by Hank Williams and what his legacy reveals about the modern South, Irondale Barbershop offers viewers quiet entr√©e to one particular slice of southern life that is literally fading away.
